summary:
REQ-2 appears implemented in FooterSection by updating the bottom-bar copyright

to show “© {currentYear} Sanjay singh Chauhan. All rights reserved.” while keeping the year dynamic. However, additional non-requested files were modified (metadata/state files), which violates the “only selected element”/minimal-change intent and may risk the constraint about not changing anything else.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state tracking file (project_state.json), which was not requested as part of updating a footer copyright line.
hallucinated_features.reason:
BuildRequest scope is limited to updating a specific footer

element; no requirement mentions updating project tracking/state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (documentation/summary file) unrelated to the requested footer text change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating summary/documentation files; it also introduces additional unrelated statements (e.g., phone updated, inquiry line) that are outside REQ-2.
